text:
Perfect! I've added a simple, elegant footer with "Made with ❤️ in Europe" to the main translator component. The footer uses:

- Consistent styling with the rest of the app (slate colors, dark mode support)
- Proper spacing (`mt-16 pb-8`)
- Centered alignment
- Same responsive container as the rest of the page
- Appropriate z-index to stay above background elements

The footer will now appear at the bottom of the translator interface with a subtle, professional look that matches the overall design aesthetic.
